files.name: index.html
files.content:
Daily Facts

1. Human babies have more bones than adults
2. The human eye is an extension of the brain
3. Greenland is the world's largest island
4. New Zealand is part of the Oceania continent
5. Earth's moon is the fift largest in the solar system
6. The moon's atmosphere is called exosphere
